s: I wasn’t sure if I would like a cocktail smoker kit. I took the risk and glad I did. It definitely adds an extra layer of complexity to my cocktails (especially whiskey/bourbon drinks and cocktails). Busy Bee is a great all-around package. The smoking kit works perfectly (you can smoke glasses on the top side or bottom side of the wooden disk, or both at the same time). The kit is basically the same price as other brands ...
